title: Mozilla removes Bypass Paywalls Clean extension from its add-ons repository
dot:
digraph G{node[shape=box];A[label="Mozilla removes Bypass Paywalls Clean extension"];B[label="Reason for removal:
- Copyright takedown notice"];C[label="Developer's response:
- No notification from Mozilla
- Speculation about user base"];D[label="Mozilla's statement:
- Forwarded takedown notice to developer
- No counter-notice received"];E[label="Alternatives for users:
- Install from GitLab
- Use uBlock Origin filters"];F[label="Risks of installing add-ons from other sources:
- Potential malware
- Security concerns"];G[label="User  reactions:
- Mixed opinions on bypassing paywalls
- Ethical concerns about content access"];A->B;A->C;A->D;A->E;E->F;E->G;}
